languages.text: {n}Сгорбленный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} оборачивается к вам.{/n} "Дипломатический режим запущен. Уведомление — Адептус Механикус //приносят извинения касательно//информируют о необходимости// проведения операции по //задержанию//аресту//ликвидации// дефектной единицы на территории {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

traits.locale_text: n}Сгорбленный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} оборачивается к вам.{/n} "Дипломатический режим запущен. Уведомление — Адептус Механикус //приносят извинения//информируют о необходимости// проведения операции по //задержанию//аресту//ликвидации// дефектной единицы на территории {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

languages.text: {n}身体を丸めた{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の従者があなたの方を向く。{/n}「外交モード作動。告知：帝国技術局は//謝罪する//{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のテリトリーでの過失あるユニットを//拘束//逮捕//停止//する作戦遂行の必要性を通知する」
languages.original_text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}驼背的仆人转向你。{/n}“外交模式已启动。公告：机械修会//深表歉意//想通知您，我们有必要在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的领地上//扣留//逮捕//终止//某个发生故障的单位。”
languages.original_text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}驼背的仆人转向你。{/n}“外交模式已启动。公告：机械修会//深表歉意//想通知您，我们有必要在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的领地上//扣留//逮捕//终止//某个发生故障的单位。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Der gebeugte Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Diplomatiemodus aktiviert. Ankündigung: Der Adeptus Mechanicus //möchte sich entschuldigen für//informiert über// die Notwendigkeit einer Operation zur //Festnahme//Verhaftung//Auslöschung// einer fehlerhaften Einheit auf dem Gebiet {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gebeugte Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Diplomatiemodus aktiviert. Ankündigung: Der Adeptus Mechanicus //entschuldigt sich für//informiert über// die Notwendigkeit einer Operation zur //Festnahme//Verhaftung//Auslöschung// einer fehlerhaften Einheit auf dem Gebiet {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur voûté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Mode diplomatique activé. Prémices : l'Adeptus Mechanicus //s'excuse//vous informe de la nécessité d'intervenir sur le territoire {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g} dans le cadre d'une opération visant à //mettre en détention//arrêter//neutraliser// une unité défaillante. »
languages.original_text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur voûté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Mode diplomatique activé. Prémices : l'Adeptus Mechanicus //s'excuse//vous informe de la nécessité d'intervenir sur le territoire {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g} dans le cadre d'une opération visant à //mettre en détention//arrêter//neutraliser// une unité défaillante. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}El encorvado sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Activando modo diplomático. Declaración: el Adeptus Mechanicus //ofrece sus disculpas//quisiera informarle de la necesidad de llevar a cabo una operación para //detener//arrestar//eliminar// a una unidad defectuosa en el territorio {mf|del|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}The hunched servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} turns to you.{/n} "Diplomacy mode engaged. Announcement: the Adeptus Mechanicus //offer their apologies for//would like to inform you of the necessity of// conducting an operation to //detain//arrest//terminate// a faulty unit on the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}El encorvado sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Activando modo diplomático. Declaración: el Adeptus Mechanicus //ofrece sus disculpas//quisiera informarle de la necesidad de llevar a cabo una operación para //detener//arrestar//eliminar// a una unidad defectuosa en el territorio {mf|del|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Kambur {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} hizmetkârı sana dönüyor.{/n} "Diplomasi modu aktif hâle getirildi. Duyuru: Adeptus Mechanicus, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} bölgesindeki kusurlu bir birimi //alıkoyma//tutuklama//imha etme// operasyonunun zarureti konusunda //size özürlerini sunuyor//sizi bilgilendirme gereği duyuyor//."
